price: 24. En er zullen bij hen bedienden rondgaan, om hen te bedienen alsof zij goed bewaarde paarlen zijn.
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
